github.description: GitHub integration for repository management, pull requests, issues, code review, and CI/CD pipeline status. Used for managing backend service repositories, reviewing API changes, and tracking schema migration PRs.
usage: gh pr create --title 'Add user authentication endpoints' --body 'Implements JWT-based auth with refresh tokens'
gh pr review --approve --body 'API design follows REST conventions, schema migration is safe'
gh issue create --title 'Add rate limiting to public API' --label 'backend,security'
gh release create v1.0.0 --title 'API v1 Release' --notes 'Initial REST API release with auth, CRUD, and pagination'

gitlab.description: GitLab integration for merge requests, CI/CD pipelines, and repository management. Used for backend service development workflows on GitLab-hosted projects.
usage: glab mr create --title 'Implement order processing service' --description 'Adds async order processing with RabbitMQ'
glab issue create --title 'Database query optimization for orders endpoint' --label 'backend,performance'

aws.description: AWS integration for backend infrastructure management including RDS databases, ElastiCache Redis clusters, SQS message queues, Lambda functions, API Gateway, Secrets Manager, and CloudWatch monitoring.
usage: aws cloudwatch get-metric-statistics --namespace Backend/API --metric-name Latency --start-time 2026-01-01T00:00:00Z --end-time 2026-01-02T00:00:00Z --period 300 --statistics Average

gcp.description: GCP integration for backend infrastructure including Cloud SQL databases, Memorystore Redis, Cloud Tasks queues, Cloud Functions, Cloud Run services, Secret Manager, and Cloud Monitoring.
